1552755084_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: I have a 15TB network attached storage for backups; striped data is a must. With something like disk hard drives, it is important to prepare for the day they die. I have to say that The NAS is pretty useful. Best OS  to use is freeNAS, which is free and open-source.
